attributes.action: Make MAJOR changes to the current laws regarding... social services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition in memory of who we can only name as Baby P, to finally toughen up the laws regarding social services, we cannot let another child suffer at the hands of a family member when it could have so easily been prevented, There is more that could be done to ensure that these innocent and vulnerable children are protected. It's a certainty that me MUST have some form of change to the current laws.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
